title: Function reference
text:
Catalog functions



hcf



hcf.Catalog



hcf.Product



hcf.Category



hcf.Embedding



hcf.Vibe



catalog

title: catalog
text:
catalog





Name
Description




Catalog
Represents a catalog of products.


Category
Represents a category of products.


Embedding
Represents an embedding.


Product
Represents a product.


Vibe
Represents a vibe.





catalog.Catalog(self, description, products=None)
Represents a catalog of products.










Name
Type
Description




id
str
The unique identifier of the catalog.


version
str
The version of the catalog.


description
str
The description of the catalog.


products
list[Product] or None
The list of products in the catalog.







catalog.Category(self, description, url, embeddings=None)
Represents a category of products.










Name
Type
Description




description
str
The description of the category.


url
str
The URL of the category.


embeddings
list[Embedding] or None
The list of embeddings associated with the category.







catalog.Embedding(self, v=None)
Represents an embedding.





Name
Type
Description




v
list[float] or None
The vector embedding.







catalog.Product(self, description, url, categories=None, vibes=None)
Represents a product.










Name
Type
Description




id
str
The unique identifier of the product.


description
str
The description of the product.


url
str
The URL of the product.


categories
list[Category] or None
The list of categories the product belongs to.


vibes
list[Vibe] or None
The list of vibes associated with the product.







catalog.Vibe(self, description, imageBase64, url, embeddings=None)
Represents a vibe.










Name
Type
Description




id
str
The unique identifier of the vibe.


description
str
The description of the vibe.


imageBase64
str or None
The base64 encoded image of the vibe.


url
str
The URL of the vibe.


embeddings
list[Embedding] or None
The list of embeddings associated with the vibe.
